ygData.subject: Anti-Camping ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey there.. Now I read that they put in Anti-Camping code ingame. I heard people say it wasnt true.. but we decided to go to Najena for the J Boots. I being 17
ygData.messageBody:
Hey there.. Now I read that they put in Anti-Camping code ingame. I heard
people say it wasnt true.. but we decided to go to Najena for the J Boots. I
being 17 and my party being on 22-25 I was the outcast, but they are my
regular companions, so I knew Id be ok. _I am not one to level efficently so
thats why im such a weenie compared to them.. Anyhow.. we get to the place
where the J boots spawn and there is a group there.. Said they've been there
for 6 hours. So We wait, and 2 spawns no boots, next 2 spawns were not even
the named NPC for them, A necro spawned instead. So After like a hour, I
got bored and we left..Decided to get tantacle whip. I have the key so we
are going back early today.. but I am thinking for what if its going to take
us 3 hours just to get one Journeyman boots ? uugh.. have any of you seen
this in specific areas besides here ? Cause I want to Kill Najena to get the
FBR, but don't want (nor have the time) to wait for 6 hours before I get
mine.

Anyone else have this issue ?

Reuben
